name: vDSP.DFT
desc: A single- and double-precision discrete Fourier transform.DeprecatedUse vDSP.DiscreteFourierTransform instead.

items.name: init?(previous: vDSP.DFT<T>?, count: Int, direction: vDSP.FourierTransformDirection, transformType: vDSP.DFTTransformType, ofType: T.Type)
items.desc: Initializes a new discrete Fourier transform instance.

items.name: func transform<U>(inputReal: U, inputImaginary: U) -> (real: [T], imaginary: [T])
func transform<U, V>(inputReal: U, inputImaginary: U, outputReal: inout V, outputImaginary: inout V)
items.desc: Computes an out-of-place discrete Fourier transform.
